title: Vikram Vedha teaser: It's Madhavan vs Vijay Sethupathi in this cop thriller : Regional cinema, News - India Today
text:
A + A - Madhavan vs Vijay Sethupathi 
Madhavan, who gave a stellar performance as a rugged boxing coach Prabhu in Irudhi Suttru, is teaming with Vijay Sethupathi, the rising star in Tamil cinema today. 
Needless to say, the Maddy-Sethupathi combo has already upped the curiosity quotient among the Tamil circuit. 
As reported, the makers have unveiled the teaser cut of the film. Going by the teaser, Vikram Vedha tells the story of two protagonists- Madhavan, a cop, and Vijay Sethupathi as a gangster. The highlight of the teaser is daunting music composed by Sam CS. 
Director duo Pushkar-Gayatri, who are known for the critically acclaimed films like Oram Poo and Va Quarter Cutting, are directing this project. 
Apart from Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi, the film also stars Shraddha Srinath, Kathir and Varalakshmi Sarathkumar in pivotal roles. 
Speaking about the film, Shraddha Srinath said, "I'm super excited. I have already met him (Madhavan) once and we hung out socially. I was awestruck by his simplicity and totally charmed by his persona," Shraddha, who is paired with Madhavan in the film." 
Meanwhile, Madhavan will reprise Dulquer Salmaan in the Tamil remake of Charlie, which will be directed by AL Vijay.
